title: Women representation in law firms
summary: The title tells us this chart shows Women representation in Law_Firms .
The graph actually shows female representation in a variety of Sector .
\\n The intention appears to be show that there is lower representation in Law_Firms , at 35 percentage , compared to 50 percentage + in other Sector .
gold: The chart compares the percentage of female representation across different sectors . Whilst insurance and tech sectors are leading the charge at over 60 % , law firms are farther behind around 35 % .
